column4: what's been the result so far? has the netflix box recieved an IP address ?
what methods have you tried thus far ?
doing that with incoming connection shuts off the connection from the wall
apparently firestarter might have some options to setup ICS for you. if you go down the route of enabling ipforwarding , then you need a dhcp server running
how new is your computer / netflix box btw ?
and I don't know how to run a dhcp server.  every time I try I mess up
the newer network cards autosense (non)crossover just fine these days
computer is probably 6 years old (it has an Athlon 1800+ chip, and I bought it at a Goodwill computer store)
funny thing is, it worked fine for a while back in 9.10, and then it just stopped working a month after I installed 10.04
does this mean you managed the dhcp server ok last time ?
I didn't set up a dhcp server
then where did the netflix get it's IP ?
are you trying anything? are you able to set static IP information on the netflix box ?
not trying anything right now, computer had hard time booting, had to rescue GRUB
as for setting up static IP on Netflix box, I don't think it'll ket me
it would be strange for it not too . i would think. but i don't have any experience with those things
